name: Don't Punch Cat !
description:
You have too much strength ! Evade enemy attacks and avoid their weakpoints to beat them !
A game by Lyrdinn : https://twitter.com/lyrdinn

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
(Controls are also shown in game with a little image after pressing start and the cinematic)

Evade enemy attacks when you see them coming and avoid punching the weak points :

-Press UP / W and DOWN / S  to move your hand

-Press  LEFT / A to avoid enemy attacks

-Press  RIGHT / D / ENTER / SPACE to punch

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
A beat them all game made for the Gogodot Ultra gamejam 2022 edition with Godot 3.4.2.
